author: Henry Beecher
message: Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul.
title: Thought of the day

author: Confucius
message: If you look into your own heart, and you find nothing wrong there, what is there to worry about? What is there to fear?
title: Thought of the day

author: John Acosta
message: You cannot have what you do not want.
title: Thought of the day

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
message: Do not follow where the path may lead. Go, instead, where there is no path and leave a trail.
title: Thought of the day
